messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Emergency Storage.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The clown armblade stung me and then ling screeched cremate the fucker.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Democratic mode, shuttle yay or nay?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Murderbone Station door subroutines. Severity level of 2. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Data theft signal detected, source registered on local gps units.
